Txt_Talk_GiagaPit_1F_Before_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: This here's what they call the Pit of Giaga. And we're the lucky devils tasked with guarding it.
*: People come here from time to time and try to throw themselves in, you see.
*: The Goddess alone knows why. However bad your life seems, that's no way to get to heaven...
*: Everyone who's gone down into the hole here to investigate has failed to return.
*: So we still don't know what's down there.
*: Oh, if one of your companions tries to hop in there, give an angel bell a ring and they'll snap right out of it. If that doesn't work...give them a light boink on the head with one.
*: Remember, if one of your party becomes confused and tries to do something silly, try ringing an angel bell in their ear.

Txt_Talk_GiagaPit_1F_After_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: It was horrible! The ground shook like anything, and when I looked, the crack had opened up even wider!
*: It looks for all the world as if some giant...thing crawled through it...
*: If it did, it took my friend<--->the other guard here<--->down there with it...

Txt_Talk_GiagaPit_1F_After_SUB_0_VOLUME_.Text: {LEADER} holds the Sphere of Light aloft!
The darkness vanishes before the Sphere of Light!
Now, nothing stands between {LEADER} and the path ahead.
